title: Beautiful Newports | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 76
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 
 
Chrissy CHAOS is SWINGING this ep! Fresh off some shows in Providence Chris is feeling GREAT! Chris talks about what happened to him and Tampa Tony at the Boston Red Socks game at Fenway park. Chris gets BANGED out for money this week. A man falls through his house and Ti Ti gets in an accident with a weirdo. The world continues to fall apart and be pure anxiety. We answer a few Patreon questions!
Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

SUPPORT THE SPONSORS TO SUPPORT THE CHAOS
If you like the RSVLTS shirt Chris is wearing in this video or have seen him wear before, check out our curated RSVLTS x Chrissy Chaos collection page where you can shop a bunch of other gear as well. Use the code ChrissyChaos at checkout for 20% off your first order!
magicspoon.com/chaos code chaos
download the upside app code chaos
 
CHRISDCOMEDY.COM for all upcoming live comedy show dates
FOLLOW Chris Distefano On Social Media
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/​
Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy​
Follow Chris' podcast with Sal Vulcano called HEY BABE!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​
